phrases: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
This should give us a good idea of what is around here.
See if you can find a menu, I am starving.
I bet we will find something to eat here!
Fire Nation cultural exhibits... jugglers, benders, magicians.
This would be a great place for me to study some real firebenders!
You might want to rethink that.
I think we better keep moving.
I have to learn firebending at some point,...
I guess we could check it out.
You want to walk into a Fire Nation town...
We will wear disguises and if it looks like trouble, we will leave.
Yeh, because we always leave before we get into trouble.
You guys stay out of sight here while we go to the festival.
It is like you are a whole different person.
I think we need some new disguises.
Where are we going to get masks like that?
Get your genu-ine Fire Festival masks here!
No one can surprise the Fire Lord!
I do not know, but there is a big crowd so it must be good.
Knowing the Fire Nation, it is probably an execution.
I got to learn that trick!
For my next trick I need a volunteer from the audience!
What do you think you are doing?
I want to get a closer look.
It is better that we do not attract any attention to ourselves.
Leeet's give her some encouragement, folks!
This next trick is called Taming the Dragon.
You will be my captured princess!
I will tame this fiery beast!
It is too strong, I cannot hold it!
No, we do not want to make a scene!
Hey, you tryin' to upstage me, kid?
I think it is time to go.
I can git ya outta here!
I hope he can really hear that bison whistle!
Nice touch setting off the fireworks.
You seem to really know your explosives.
You are a Fire Nation soldier!
More than a man really, he is a myth, but he is real, a living legend,...
He was very highly ranked, we get it.
But he could not take the madness any more.
He is the first person ever to leave the army... and live.
I am the second, but you do not get to be a legend for that.
Some say he is mad... but he is not!
You mean there is a firebender out here who is not with the Fire Lord?
We have got to go see him!
We are not going to go find some crazy firebender!
And he is the perfect person to train the Avatar!
That is why I followed you into the festival.
Look, thanks for the help, but we are leaving for the north pole in the morning.
Sokka, this could be my only chance to meet a firebending master...
It cannot hurt just to talk to him.
That is what you said about going to the festival!
Why does not anyone ever listen to me!?
Jeong Jeong told you not to look for Avatar!
Hold on, you know these guys!?
Oh that is okay, we can chat later.
Is that where Jeong Jeong is?
I need to talk to him right away.
He is a great man, great man!
So, the Avatar was here and you let slip away?
Yes, sir, but other than that the festival went off without a hitch!
I do not care about your local crime rates!
They headed into the forest, up the river I suspect.
We are going after the Avatar.
Can I see Jeong Jeong now?
He is very angry that I brought you here.
He wants you to leave immediately.
Why will not he see me?
He says you are not ready.
Says you have not mastered waterbending and earthbending yet.
Wait, how does he know that?
He saw the way you walked into camp.
Master, I need to learn firebending.
Only a fool seeks his own destruction.
What would a boy know of destiny?
If a fish lives its whole life in this river, does he know the river's destiny?
Only that it runs on and on out of his control!
He may follow where it flows, but he cannot see the end.
Ookay, but it is the Avatar's duty to master all of the bending disciplines.
To master the bending disciplines, you must first master discipline itself.
But you have no interest in this, so I have no interest in you!
This could be my only chance.
How can I teach you if you refuse to listen?
Before learning firebending you must learn water and earth.
Water is cool and soothing, earth is steady and stable, but fire, fire is alive!
It breathes, it grows, without a bender, a rock will not throw itself!
But fire will spread and destroy everything in its path...
I have mastered the elements a thousand times in a thousand lifetimes.
Now, I must do it once again.
You will teach the Avatar firebending.
Yes, yes, I will teach you.
Look at your friend, is she talking?
Even that oaf knows to concentrate on what he is doing!
But what am I concentrating on?
Feel the heat of the sun.
It is the greatest source of fire.
Yet, it is in complete balance with nature!
So when do I get to make some fire?
Are we coming up here so I do not burn anything with my fire blasts?
Power in firebending comes from the breath.
That is why you must master proper breath control.
You brought me up here to breathe?
Now, inhale through the nose and exhale through the mouth...
I did not tell you to stop!
I have been breathing for hours.
I want you to stop wasting my time!
I already know how to squat and breathe and feel the sun.
I want to know how to shoot fire out of my fingertips!
I had a pupil once who had no interest in learning discipline.
He was only concerned with the power of fire...
Its nature is to consume and without control it destroys everything around it.
Learn restraint, or risk destroying yourself and everything you love.
I thought about what you said.
I promise I will be more patient.
We are going to work with fire now.
I want you to keep this flame...
This is the worst firebending instruction ever.
All he does is leave me alone for hours to concentrate or breathe.
I am sure there is a good reason.
But I am ready to do so much more.
Aang, that is great, but you should take it slow.
Wonder how that juggler did it?
I told you we should not mess around with this!
I am sorry, I did not...
The great benders of the water tribe sometimes have this ability.
I have always wished I were blessed like you... free from this burning curse.
But you are a great master.
You have powers I will never know.
But fire brings only destruction and pain.
It forces those of us burdened with its care to walk a razor's edge...
Go get your friends and flee!
Do not come back here or you will all be destroyed.
My old teacher gave up fighting a long time ago.
I am fine, we have got to get out of here.
Jeong Jeong tried to tell me that I was not ready.
I am never going to firebend again.
But right now, we have to get out here.
Zhao and his soldiers are attacking!
I cannot believe my former master has become nothing more than a simple savage.
It is you who have embraced savagery, Zhao.
That title will not help you against the Avatar.
Do not try to fight him!
I think I can handle a child.
I have never seen such raw power.
He is run off into the woods.
Let us find out what my old master has taught you.
I see he taught you how to duck and run like a coward.
But I doubt he showed you what a firebender is truly capable of!
I thought you were just getting warmed up.
Man, they will make anyone an admiral these days!
I do not know why, but I thought you would be better than Zuko.
No wonder to run now, you little smart mouth!
You have not thrown a single blow!
Jeong Jeong said you had no restraint.
When did you learn how to do that?
Oh... well then thanks for all the first aid over the years.
Like when I fell into the grease briar bramble...
He tried to get the first fish hook out with another fish hook.
Oh, and the time that big snake bit me!
